sentences.sContent: Before voting was democratized in England in the nineteenth century, nonetheless, the advocates of reform repudiated any redistributive intent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before voting was democratized in England in the nineteenth century, nonetheless, the advocates of reform repudiated any redistributive intent.
sentences.sCn: 然而，在选举民主化之前的十九世纪英格兰，鼓吹改革的人却否定一切再分配的意图。

words.tran: 第九十的；九十分之一的
